text: The Ministry of Planning and Finance (; abbreviated MOPF; formerly the Ministry of Finance) administers Burma's monetary, fiscal policies and national planning. Ministry of Planning and Finance is currently led by Soe Win, a partner at Deloitte. He was among new appointees of President Win Myint. The Ministry of Planning and Finance's State Lottery Department administers the Burmese lottery. == Ministers responsible for Finance == *U Tin Tut, 1946-1947 *Thakin Mya, 1947https://ro.uow.edu.au/cgi/viewcontent.cgi?filename=0&article;=1106&context;=theses&type;=additional *U Tin Tut, 1947-1948 *U Tin, 1948-1956http://web.stanford.edu/group/tomzgroup/pmwiki/uploads/1374-1959-JohnstoneStaff- a-IEM.pdf *Bo Khin Maung Gale, 1956-1958 *U Kyaw Min, 1958-1960 *Thakin Tin, 1960-1962 *San Yu, 1963-1972 *U Lwin, 1972-1977 *U Than Sein, 1977 *U Tun Tin, 1977-1988 *Maung Maung Khin, 1988-1989 *David Oliver Abel, 1989-1992 *Win Tin, 1992-1997 *U Khin Maung Thein, December 1997 - February 2003 *Hla Tun, February 2003 - August 2012 *Win Shein, September 2012 - March 2016 *Kyaw Win, March 2016 - May 2018 *Soe Win, May 2018 -http://pubdocs.worldbank.org/en/918571541108839939/MIGAGovernors.pdf ==See also== * Cabinet of Burma ==References== ==External links== * Official website Category:Government ministries of Myanmar Myanmar Category:Ministries established in 1948 Category:1948 establishments in Burma Category:Finance in Myanmar
title: Ministry of Planning and Finance (Myanmar)
